text: Sabayon Linux is a Linux distribution based on Gentoo. == Editions == The versions currently available are: Name Architecture Desktop Environment Availability Sabayon GNOME 64 Bit GNOME 3 DAILY and stable Sabayon KDE KDE Sabayon LXDE LXDE No longer developed Sabayon XFCE Xfce DAILY and stable Sabayon MATE MATE Sabayon Minimal None == References == Category:Linux distributions
title: Sabayon Linux
